name: Return
description:
Return;


"Solve or Die"
Escape Space Station, Puzzle, Shooting VR Game.
Defeat aliens and solve puzzles to escape to Earth in a contaminated space station!

How to Play

You can select a button in the play screen by pressing the trigger button on the VR controller.
You can check the operation method by pressing the A button on the VR controller.

Introduce Developers
Yeni, TG Lee, Seyoung Yang
This VR game was created by three friends using UnrealEngine5 for about 7 weeks.
We hope you enjoy playing our game!

(Waiting for Update Approval)

Language Selection/b]
We have 2 options : English, Korean
At the beginning of the game, press "Settings" and select language you want.
Go back to main page, and Enjoy our game!
